trans-unit.source: Defines a contract that components can use to access information about an event across application domain and process boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Define un contrato que los componentes pueden usar para tener acceso a información sobre un evento entre los límites del dominio de aplicación y del proceso.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract> provides information about an event of a remote object that implements the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interface.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract> proporciona información acerca de un evento de un objeto remoto que implementa la <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: To access one or more events of a remote object, use the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> method to get an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> that represents the type of the remote object.
trans-unit.target: Para obtener acceso a uno o varios eventos de un objeto remoto, use la <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteObjectContract.GetRemoteType%2A> método para obtener un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract> que representa el tipo del objeto remoto.
A continuación, llame a la <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetEvent%2A> o <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteTypeContract.GetEvents%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el método que se usó para agregar un delegado de controlador de eventos al evento que <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> that represents the method that was used to add an event handler delegate to the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> que representa el método que se usó para agregar un delegado de controlador de eventos al evento que <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: To add a delegate to the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Para agregar un delegado al evento, llame a la <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> método de la <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> que <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetAddMethod%2A> devuelve.

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pasar un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> que representa el delegado en el `parameters` parámetro de <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns information about the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve información sobre el evento que <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData" /> that provides information about the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData" /> que proporciona información sobre el evento que <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: The information provided by the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData> structure includes the name of the event and the type that declares the event.
trans-unit.target: La información proporcionada por el <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.RemoteMemberData> estructura incluye el nombre del evento y el tipo que declara el evento.

trans-unit.source: Returns the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el método que se usó para quitar un delegado de controlador de eventos del evento que <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> that represents the method that was used to remove an event handler delegate from the event that this <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifies.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract" /> que representa el método que se usó para quitar un delegado de controlador de eventos del evento que <see cref="T:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract" /> identifica.

trans-unit.source: To remove a delegate from the event, call the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> method of the <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> that <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A> returns.
trans-unit.target: Para quitar un delegado del evento, llame a la <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A> método de la <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract> que <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteEventInfoContract.GetRemoveMethod%2A> devuelve.

trans-unit.source: Pass an <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> that represents the delegate into the `parameters` parameter of <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pasar un <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteDelegateContract> que representa el delegado en el `parameters` parámetro de <xref:System.AddIn.Contract.Automation.IRemoteMethodInfoContract.Invoke%2A>.
